imdb.plot outline: Prathibimbam is a story of an active girl. She is in the front row of everywhere although she belongs to a middle class family she has the courage to do all the thing. A son of industrialist fallen in love with her and they felt the same for each other. But initially as she is not the perfect choice so his sister in law tries to tie the knot with her own sister. But they solved the initial hazards and got married. But after that she faces a lot of problems in her husband's house.
imdb.title: Prathibimbam
plot: _Prathibimbam_ (qv) is a story of an active girl. She is in the front row of everywhere although she belongs to a middle class family she has the courage to do all the thing. A son of industrialist fallen in love with her and they felt the same for each other. But initially as she is not the perfect choice so his sister in law tries to tie the knot with her own sister. But they solved the initial hazards and got married. But after that she faces a lot of problems in her husband's house.::Cherrie
